alert.title: Airport Alert
alert.text: New Ticket Counter, Gates, and Baggage Locations in Boston Logan International Airport - Southwest Airlines will be relocating within Boston Logan International Airport. As of Wednesday, April 1, 2015, the ticket counter, baggage service office, and gates will be located in Terminal A. The new Southwest gates will be A18-A22. Due to this movement, please allow for extra time to navigate the airport.

body.title: TERMINAL AND GATE
body.heading: Terminal A
body.text:
Gates 18-22

  • Fly By Checkin
  • Fly By Security
  • Express Bag Drop

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area:  Located on the arrival level, outside the doors of the Southwest baggage claim carousel
